member.name: P:YasES.Persistance.Sqlite.SqliteConfiguration.TableName
member.summary: Defines the name of the event store table within the database file. Defaults to Events.

member.name: P:YasES.Persistance.Sqlite.SqliteConfiguration.PaginationSize
member.summary: Defines the pagination size when reading events. Lower values will reduce the read lock within the database but increases the number of queries executed when more items than the specified page size would get returned.
